abstract: McDonalds on Eighth Avenue between 34th and 35th Streets in Manhattan has become gathering place for drug addicts who have nowhere else to go, recalling seedy atmosphere of bygone Times Square; restaurant is situated near methadone dispensary, needle exchange and two outpatient substance-abuse programs; many customers stay for hours as effects of methadone where off, while others use it to consume and sell heroin and other drugs.
lead_paragraph: At the McDonald’s restaurant on Eighth Avenue between 34th and 35th Streets, tourists sit amid drug addicts looking for a fix or nodding off at tables.

headline.main: A Manhattan McDonald’s With Many Off-the-Menu Sales
headline.print_headline: A McDonald’s With Many Off-the-Menu Sales

snippet: At the McDonald’s restaurant on Eighth Avenue between 34th and 35th Streets, tourists sit amid drug addicts looking for a fix or nodding off at tables.
